title: Graton Rancheria Restoration Act
content: Requires the Secretary of the Interior, upon application by the Tribe, to accept in trust for the Tribe any real property located in Marin or Sonoma County, California, after the property is conveyed to the Secretary if there are no adverse legal claims to such property. Provides that any such property shall: (1) be part of the Tribe's reservation, (2) not be exempt from the Indian Gaming Regulatory Act. And (3) be exempt from all local, State, and Federal taxation. Directs the Secretary to compile a membership roll of the Tribe not later than one year after the date of the enactment of this Act. Provides for: (1) an Interim Tribal Council to be the Tribe's governing body, (2) an election to ratify a Tribal constitution, and (3) the election of Tribal officials under such constitution.
